Nelson policewoman Lyn Fleming’s death: Family of slain officer join police at vigil https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-policewoman-lyn-flemings-death-1000-mourners-expected-at-evening-vigil/Q7TIIKM4YJBYVJ73IYPR76A5L4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-policewoman-lyn-flemings-death-1000-mourners-expected-at-evening-vigil/Q7TIIKM4YJBYVJ73IYPR76A5L4/ "The fact that we are not looking at two dead police officers is miraculous." Photo / Katrina Bennett
